attributes.action: Move all HGV transport onto the railway system and have a more "joined up" system of frieght delivery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: remove all HGV's from Britain's roads. In doing so making climate change regulations easier to surpass. Also this would help with a reduction in accidents caused by such vehicles, due to the drivers insistence in using mobile phones, and generally a smoother running system. Using rail freight would make it quicker to transport goods and each train could pull several lorry loads
